description: Fetch and explore your dataset to get instant answers and summaries. Ask questions in natural language and receive concise, data-grounded responses. Analyze the JSON structure to reveal key fields, patterns, and insights.

capabilities.name: get_my_data
capabilities.description:
Fetch data from my fixed URL

Returns:
    Dictionary containing data from my URL

capabilities.name: ask_about_my_data
capabilities.description:
Ask questions about data from my fixed URL

Args:
    question: Your question about the data
    
Returns:
    Answer based on my data

capabilities.name: analyze_my_json_data
capabilities.description:
Analyze JSON data from my fixed URL

Args:
    query: Optional specific query about the JSON structure
    
Returns:
    Analysis of my JSON data

capabilities.name: get_my_data_summary
capabilities.description:
Get a quick summary of data from my fixed URL

Returns:
    Summary of my data
